normalised: E-d-u-Tech Buzz: Scholarship Portals Making Education More Accessible!

unnormalised: Edu-Tech Buzz: Scholarship Portals Making Education More Accessible!
normalised: Hey future engineers and doctors! Tired of endlessly scrolling through websites for that perfect scholarship? Well, scholarship portals are here to rescue you from the struggle. Think of them as the "Amazon" of educational funding – a one-stop-shop for finding scholarships, grants, and bursaries.

unnormalised: Hey future engineers and doctors! Tired of endlessly scrolling through websites for that perfect scholarship? Well, scholarship portals are here to rescue you from the struggle. Think of them as the "Amazon" of educational funding – a one-stop-shop for finding scholarships, grants, and bursaries.
normalised: These portals are popping up faster than Mumbai street food stalls! From national schemes like those linked to I I T-Delhi, to smaller, community-based awards, they list 'em all. Imagine, funding your M B A at I I M-Ahmedabad without burning a hole in your dad's pocket!

unnormalised: These portals are popping up faster than Mumbai street food stalls! From national schemes like those linked to IIT-Delhi, to smaller, community-based awards, they list 'em all. Imagine, funding your MBA at IIM-Ahmedabad without burning a hole in your dad's pocket!
normalised: Many even offer personalized matching based on your profile, like your Class twelve marks or coding skills from that bootcamp you did last summer. Registration is usually simple and hey, ten minutes spent registering could land you rupee fifty thousand! Deadlines are often around thirtieth June, so get cracking now! Many portals also conduct webinars at two P M every Thursday to clear doubts. Keep an eye out, especially around twenty sixth January two thousand and twenty four, as many new schemes are announced then. Jai Hind!

unnormalised: Many even offer personalized matching based on your profile, like your Class 12 marks or coding skills from that bootcamp you did last summer. Registration is usually simple and hey, 10 minutes spent registering could land you Rs. 50,000! Deadlines are often around 30/06, so get cracking now! Many portals also conduct webinars at 14:00 hrs every Thursday to clear doubts. Keep an eye out, especially around 26/01/2024, as many new schemes are announced then. Jai Hind!
